algorithm_technique: KMP algorithm for pattern matching on transformed array
problem_summary_simple: Count subarrays in nums that follow a given pattern of relative element changes.
problem_summary_technical: Applies KMP algorithm to a transformed array representing relative differences between adjacent elements.
key_insights: The core idea is to transform the problem into a string matching problem.
The KMP algorithm is efficient for finding occurrences of a pattern within a text.
The transformation to a sequence of -1, 0, 1 simplifies the comparison logic.
